Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Interface ViewObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController
public interface ViewObserver
Custom observer interface for views. It supports different types of notification. From the different views to ClientController

  • Method Details

    • onAskServerInfo

      void onAskServerInfo(Map<String,String> serverInfo)
      Create a new connection to the server with the updated info.
      Parameters:
      serverInfo - a map of server address and server port.

    • onSendLoginRequest

      void onSendLoginRequest(String nickname)
      Sends a message to the server with the updated nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to be sent.
